inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: able to read and understand English

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: alert and cooperative man who doesn't have any signs of dementia

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: negative serum or urine pregnancy test within 48 hours prior to entry

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: ability and willingness of subject to provide informed consent

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: His past medical history is significant for hypertension

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: He stated his medications help with shaking and slow movement

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient complains of shaking and slow movement
